QuestData.Title: The Path of the Invoker
QuestData.CompletionText: You honor my kind, $N. Strike down the enemies of Kalimdor! Show them what it means to deface the land of eternal starlight.$b$bYou have earned another enhancement. Hand me your signet ring so that I may bolster its power.
QuestData.RewardText: Your rise amongst the rank of the Brood is most impressive, $n. May you never stray from the path of the invoker!
